item.title: Morgan add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Give me lust, baby. Flash. Give me malice. Flash. Give me detached existentialist ennui. Flash. Give me rampant intellectualism as a coping mechanism. Flash." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
Morgan add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
item.description: "Scars are the paler pain of survival received unwillingly and displayed in the language of injury." -- Mark Z. Danielewski

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
item.description: "It is hungry, it it immortal. Worse, it knows nothing of whim." -- Mark Z. Danielewski

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "An artisan without memories, whose only dream was to die of fatigue in the oblivion and misery of his little gold fishes." -- Gabriel García Márquez
